website_summaries.verdict: A well-balanced and sturdy way to switch up your routine.
pros: A proprietary mixture of steel and iron affords this bar impressive stability, while the EVA foam exterior provides a comfortable grip
Bar is 51.25 inches long and available in 5-, 8-, 10-, 12-, 15-, and 20-pound variants
A solid addition to any home gym or fitness class
cons: Some users didn’t care for the foam coating on the bar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for home workouts. Nicely padded. I got the 20lb bar to practice bodypump routines at home rather than messing about with plates and barbell. I like the versatility of the bar, plus the squared of ends means it won't roll around the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Di Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Very thick bar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 15 lb bar, and the diameter of the bar is very wide. I'm female, and have what I imagine are average sized hands, and they barely fit all the way around it. In addition, you just feel silly lifting this heavily padded 15 pounds that's like 4 in. in diameter. I ordered a Yes4All 12 pound bar as well and thats a normal diameter, so I will most likely continue to order that brand.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing and perfect for quick and efficient at-home workouts when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing it used in a post by someone I follow. It's amazing and perfect for quick and efficient at-home workouts when I don't have time for the gym, and can be really versatile. Excited to keep working with it, and will try to find one slight heavier. I saw a few answers and review suggesting tying additional weight to it, but I'm not sure I would. Could see adding wrist/ankle weights to make it a bit heavier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kunstman

customer_reviews.title: Good weight for senior citizens and/or beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I like this evenly weighted workout bar. It has a cushioned grip coating the full length of the bar--not too soft and not too hard. The rubber end caps protect the floor (and toes) if it gets dropped. The diameter is comfortable for adult womens' hands. Ten pounds is not too heavy for oldsters like me, and it works great for senior boot camp class. Easy to store when I'm not using it. Shipping was not a problem.....arrived in 2days with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Yogini Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this barbell. It feels comfortable on my back/neck and it's easy to grip as well. I have added ankle weights to increase the weight on it so I can take it from 20lbs to a 50lb barbell easily. I also enjoy the rubber ends because it doesn't slide on the floor or scratch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: 10 lb bodybar
customer_reviews.text: My ten lb bar arrived with a small gouge and ripples. It is bulkier (longer and wider) than my 15 lb bar from another brand but works well. This is not an issue if you have average size hands. Glad to get this during pandemic when my gym is closed. Now to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Slayr

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Heavier then I expected at first but I don't care cause it could actually be heavier for certain exercises I am doing. I just need to buy varying sizes if I really want to but the quality was pretty good. Has nice padding I literally dropped it on my completely bare foot the first day I got it, right there where your shoe laces would tie up at the top if I was wearing them...all I had was a minor 30-60 second delayed reaction of ow that did hurt a little bit, didn't even bruise! Lol don't recommend having butterfingers using it lol but all in all I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Circumference is too large to hold comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Circumference is ridiculously large which makes it uncomfortable to use. The bar is also a bit long, but that isn’t much of an issue. I like the other bars I have (different brand) so much better because of the size. I’d return it but don’t know how I’d package it.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty nice. It's good quality and a nice length
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice. It's good quality and a nice length. I've been doing a few arm exercise and also using it doing crunches against my bosu ball. Since the end caps have the rubber caps, I can lean it up against the wall to store it without scratching anything or tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: TenaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a great product and ideally it would be except that however it is shipped it is not ideal because mine arrived with a tear near the middle. Since the material is foam it is easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Too large of width
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable to use as the bar is a larger width and hard to grasp. I've never experienced this problem with any additional weighted bars.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Foam
customer_reviews.text: I gotta admit right off but there is too much foam. I don't have big man hands. I can still use it and will not return it. I just feel like I'm not getting a solid grip. I want another bar but I'm going to find one with thin rubber and not foam. So as far as function it does the job. I used it right out of the box. The end caps seem overly chunky.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This work out bell is very sturdy. Well built. No complaints. Described as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: almie

customer_reviews.title: Used item was a good value
customer_reviews.text: Although this item was used and it had some signs of use, for its intended purpose it is perfect. All it needed was a good cleaning which I would have done anyway during this COVID-19 period.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.N.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product. It is definitely heavier than I I was expecting but not too bad. Box arrived damaged but the product was fine.. could have UPS who messed up the box. I’m glad to be able to add a little weight to my workouts without a big weight system.. Edit: make sure you don’t lay it on something by accident like I did.. I laid mine on a cord not realizing it and now the foam has an indentation.. My bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT & QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding. They are a great size for both a man's hands and a woman's. They are balanced well and the material is very comfortable. I love that they have the square ends, as they help keep the bar from rolling away when doing exercises, and for resting against a wall. Definite win!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Laguna

customer_reviews.title: Really good bar for working out at home
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a lifting bar, but I found it too long and awkward to use. I love this bar because it's padded, and short enough to use in your living room and not be banging into things. It's much thicker than it appears in the pictures. It fills pretty much my whole hand. Not as thick as a soda can, but only a bit smaller. The padding makes it very comfortable to hold. I plan to buy this in other weights too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Great for doing squats which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Great for doing squats which is what i bought it for. You can definitely feel the weight when working out. Ive had this bar for years now and the quality has been the same since the day bought. Its perfectly balanced for what its supposed to be used for. Seller was fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: DreamChii

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. It's solid and versatile and has a really good hand feel. Having a few well chosen pieces of equipment at home is great for a few sets throughout the day. Add a Bosu, a medicine ball, and a couple free weights and you can do quite a lot in very little space without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Ojai Heather

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Exactly what I was hoping for. Can store pretty much anywhere and is made with excellent grip material. No problems whatsoever. Will be purchasing the next weight up as soon as I'm ready.
customer_reviews.author: O So Hap E

customer_reviews.title: I've used non-padded bars and they weren't so comfortable. I'm glad with my buy
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of trying to make my own weight bar since these seem to cost so much. This bar in particular was affordable and the quality is more than expected. The padding actually helps my grip, I've used non-padded bars and they weren't so comfortable. I'm glad with my buy! I have the 10 lb bar. I bought photographer's sand bags to fill with rice/sand for a pulley weight, so I can actually just hang those on the bar if I want more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Lopez de Arenosa

customer_reviews.title: Great bar, just remember it's 50"
customer_reviews.text: The bar itself is quite good, and is exactly what I was looking for to continue my PT for my shoulder. My only complaint is my own stupidity for not noticing the 50" length, which is fairly long, which is of no fault of the product's as it clearly stated it, I just didn't visualize it very well... It's got a nice squeezy bar for a great grip, and the slightly squared end means I can stand it up against the wall without worrying about it rolling away. I know there were some reports of bars arriving damaged, but mine got here in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for intended purposes and bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: The 2 end caps were not aligned. both were twisted and hence could not rese flat on the ground which is the very purpose of having square endcaps. the quality of the end caps is also bad. the rubber padding is too thick and soft. This happers the firm grip and grip stability on the bar to do the exercises, especially the rows and other hand exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Surendra V.

customer_reviews.title: The only barbell I'll buy from now on
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with a weighted barbell and it is fantastic! I'm more into cardio than strength training and have always felt uncomfortable in the past using barbells with disc weights because of sometimes feeling off balance and fearing tippage. With this I feel 100% secure in my stance with the weight being equally distributed across the entire bar. The girth of the bar is fine for my small hands and the 20lb weight is perfect for my 5'3, 120lb frame.
customer_reviews.author: sunsplash

customer_reviews.title: JUST WANT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: ITS SOFT. ITS A LITTLE THICK AND THE BOX IT WAS SEND IN WAS RIDICULOUS. A 24 X 60 BOX FOR THIS POLE WAS JUST UNNECESSARY. LOOKED LIKE A DINING TABLE WAS IN THE BOX. BUT I LIKE THE WEIGHT AND THE LENGTH. SO MANY POSSIBILITIES IN MY EXERCISE REGIMEN
customer_reviews.author: SHA - LADY

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar, so versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this bar. I do floor work and arm work. It is great for when you don't want the heavy metal 45 lb bar. I love the end caps. It holds the bar in place on the floor when I do lunges with it planted on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lumadue

customer_reviews.title: It's just a weight bar but still should have arrived in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to working out with regular weights, e.g., dumbbells. And while I like the cushy foam covering on the bar, which makes it easy to grip, apparently it's way too fragile, as the bar arrived damaged with the covering torn in several places. Also, as one reviewer already wrote, the bar was quite dirty. I realize it's only a wieght bar, and it's bound to get dirty from use, but really, it should have at least been delivered to my home in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy with my purchase I received it yesterday and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: extremely happy with my purchase I received it yesterday and it's perfect exactly like the picture the weight on it is perfect I'm so so happy and shipping was fast I cannot wait to do many exercises with this bar I highly recommend it u will not regret it at all...... Update :love love love this bar I did so many arms and legs workout using this bar I'm so so happy I have this highly highly recommend this to anyone u will not be disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: D.r

customer_reviews.title: Good weighted bar.
customer_reviews.text: As described on website. Very glad that it comes earlier than estimated ( due to current pandemic) . Thank u very much🙏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Home gym item
customer_reviews.text: Another great addition to the home gym! I love these body bars and compared pricing across multiple areas. Amazon had the best rate in these "heavier" bars. It's wrapped in foam with a thick rubber on each end. Foam was cut in one area when it arrived and kinda dusty? But I just wiped it down with a damp paper towel and put some black electrical tape over the cut. Should be fine
customer_reviews.author: cobraquinn

customer_reviews.title: I did not know I needed this in my life
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. I was worried at first because I ordered the 15lb bar, but the thing felt like 50 lbs coming out of the box. It is quite a bit thicker than I expected, but the covering is cushy, so it's fine. I used it as a press and a counterweight for crunches, and my abs haven't felt this much on fire in a long time (good fire). It is so simple, yet so effective. Ten stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job....
customer_reviews.text: So I got this delivered but it has a slash in the rubber around the area you hold the weight. I didn't return it because of the hassle and weight. This bar that I got (20lb) was ALL BLACK the tips were NOT red as pictures. No big deal to me since the color doesn't affect my workout. I didn't return it because the bar IS 20lbs and long and skinny and the box is almost as big as myself and wouldn't have fit into my Honda Civic trunk. I don't plan on using it 24/7 so it won't affect the tear. But it does do the job and I have incorporated into my workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Litrellvf

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than other barbells with no padding. Great buy and quality all around!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality barbell. Cushioned, which makes it more comfortable than the ones found at the gym. No need for extra padding. The item came as described with no damage whatsoever. The packing came in damaged, but I chose that option when I made the purchase to save a few dollars and I do not regret it because I do not keep nor need the box.
customer_reviews.author: peruvianbutterfly39

customer_reviews.title: Need a weighted bar for specifics activities? This is a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Weighted workout bar perfect for HIIT training and weighted balance postures. The item arrived in perfect condition and as shown. The padding on the bar is subject to tearing/degrading depending on how it is handled/cared for.
customer_reviews.author: Aeacus

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this barbell for myself as a birthday gift in February of 2014. I use this thing ALL the time! It is super comfy because it is padded, so I use it for Good Mornings, Squats, Bridges, Deadlifts, sit-ups, and so much more! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Renee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bar. It is large. If your hands are small, it may be a bit much for you. It is pretty long as well. It is well padded which is what make it large. I like the padding as it adds to the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: CPBL

customer_reviews.title: I'm Sore
customer_reviews.text: Don't underestimate how much weight you can handle. This is a great product but I scoffed at twenty pounds, even thinking that perhaps I needed another brand that offered a heavier bar. Unless you are in professional athlete shape this is great. I'm not in horrible shape, just not used to this level of weight while stretching and making these moves - it will definitely give you a better workout.
customer_reviews.author: James Syphax

customer_reviews.title: Mine came bent but I still use it
customer_reviews.text: I use these frequently. I have the 8 and 12, and that is a good beginner combo. There are lots of free workout videos online that use these things. I use them for different exercises, including upper and lower body. I some times use them for my taekwondo staff routine. The 8 has a nice grip but it came bent. The 12 is much thicker, but I don't mind as much as other reviewers. The padding is nice, so they don't damage my wood floors if they tip over. Dumbbells are more useful, but these are a good addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Firat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice grip, weighted as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great price for such a useful piece of workout equipment for your home. The bar has a very comfortable cushioned grip and appears to be of good quality. I love working out with body bars and if you aren't sure where to begin on exercises I suggest trying Youtube.
customer_reviews.author: frqntAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: useful but wide diameter
customer_reviews.text: I use these frequently. I have the 8 and 12, and that is a good beginner combo. There are lots of free workout videos online that use these things. I use them for different exercises, including upper and lower body. I some times use them for my taekwondo staff routine. The 8 has a nice grip but it came bent. The 12 is much thicker, but I don't mind as much as other reviewers. The padding is nice, so they don't damage my wood floors if they tip over. Dumbbells are more useful, but these are a good addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Firat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good product, a little more lightweight than I'd like, but does the trick since I've been stuck at home.
customer_reviews.author: Moisa J Wroy

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived a little late but by checking tracking it seemed to come straight from China. It was in great shape. Not dirt and no tears in the padding. It is just right weight for me right now until I move up to the 20 lb. I like not having to change weights as you have to with a regular weight bar and lifting it is better because the weight is evenly distributed instead of just on the endsof the bar. Easier to store also.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar, good length and girth
customer_reviews.text: Nice bar, good length and girth. Both my wife and I can use it. There was no smell to the rubbery wrap. The only con is that the orange caps were not properly aligned when glued on.
customer_reviews.author: Artur C.

customer_reviews.title: The foam is nice but it is REALLY LONG
customer_reviews.text: This bar is okay. I probably would have sent it back but the shipping would have been more than the product so I kept it. The foam is nice but it is REALLY LONG. Like, almost as tall as I am. I was expecting a bar that was maybe 2ft long max. I probably just read the description wrong. I use it occasionally but would not but again. My bar came in good condition and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Craig

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 5 bars I ordered were damaged upon arrival, resulting in me returning them for a replacement. I'm hoping the replacements are not damaged, otherwise I will have to return and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: ... bar is a thicker material which makes it feel dirty when I'm sweating during a workout
customer_reviews.text: The bar is a thicker material which makes it feel dirty when I'm sweating during a workout. It's nice enough, but I'll consider a bar w/o foamy material when it's time to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Newbee

customer_reviews.title: great for strength training
customer_reviews.text: the item looked used when I received it. Other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Overall sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great body bar, except I did notice a slight tear already.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Mostly I found that it's easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I found that it's easy to carry around, easy grip. I was worried it would be shorter (for some reason) but it is a nice length.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The end cap came unglued when I tried to pull the bar from the tube packaging. Take a look at the photo to see the level of rust. Horrible quality. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Shipped fast!
customer_reviews.text: The bar came in two days. Great quality. Well packaged. The reason I'm giving it a 4 out of 5 is because the foam padding that you hold on to is pretty thick. Much thicker than similar bars at the gym. Not quite as easy to hold, but is completely sufficient. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Honestbee

customer_reviews.title: Here is a perfect example of getting what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The rubber had too much give causing it to be extremely fragile and tearing and having indentations just by leaning them upright against the body bar rack I bought to store them when not in use.... Returned all 3 body bars I bought. Here is a perfect example of getting what you pay for :(
customer_reviews.author: puppycat2

customer_reviews.title: Torn upon arrival...
customer_reviews.text: Way too much foam and Amazon did a terrible job packaging. Project was ripped upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great workout tool and 15 pounds is just what I needed. I use it for my ab routine and the bar is cushioned enough that it is easy on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: RacerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Ohhh boy!
customer_reviews.text: Maaaaaaan...... this this is amazing! Wonderful piece to add to my workout routine. I love it so very much great buy great purchase great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great replacement for home use instead of heavy freeweight bar
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend who uses it daily. I have the 10 and the 20 lb bars and use them every other day along with my dumbell and resistance band workouts....great replacement for home use instead of heavy freeweight bar.
customer_reviews.author: LaPetite

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Great quality. Feels great and price is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda DeClet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: durable bar that lost a little padding when the puppy decided to chew on it, still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amador J.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey addition to abdominal/back routine
customer_reviews.text: Use these at my company's gym. Very good for working the obliques and lower back. A bit pricey however when one looks at them for what they are: (rubber enclosed metal). Purchased one 15lb bar however to have at home. That said, at a lower price point I would consider purchasing additional ones for my home gym. However at the current price point, I'll hold at one and continue to utilize the full set at work.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Man Army

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BAR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cap bar is my favorite workout buddy! I am 5'4, 113 pounds & I got the 20lb. Its perfect for squats & lunges, Makes working out fun & I look forward to the workouts!! The cushion pad is amazing, I love the compact size its great for women, GET ONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: It weighs 10lbs and is a bar - exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described, a 10lb bar. I couldn't remove the packaging stickers without ripping off pieces of the foam padding on the bar. This isn't the highest quality (otherwise it woudn't have ripped) but this works well for me. It was a great price, arrived quickly, and it does exactly what is needed (weigh 10lbs and be a bar :) )
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great weight
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 20lb for basement toning workout. Perfect weight. I have a 15lb and needed a little more. Packed well, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: F.B.

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice soft feel to the grip
customer_reviews.text: It does what you'd expect for a five-poind bar. It has a nice soft feel to the grip, so it's very easy to do your exercises with.
customer_reviews.author: RIppolito

customer_reviews.title: This product was just as advertised. You could spend ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as advertised. You could spend more, but why would you. I would buy more products from this seller without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Levann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these weighted bars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these weighted bars!! I have a few of them in different weights. They store easy and convenient size to workout anywhere at home.
customer_reviews.author: GymJunkie

customer_reviews.title: I love the bar I just don't like the chemical smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the bar I just don't like the chemical smell it has or the warning about state of California says it's chemicals can cause problems with the reproductive system when I finish using I store it in the closet
customer_reviews.author: chazzy

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of olympic lifting and I use this bar to mobilize at home. Mainly I just wanted some weight on my back while I sit in a squat. I might do some lifting drills with it but I really don't want to be throwing it around in the house. It had a foam covering the bar which is annoying. I don't have large hands so I just cut it out. I wish it were longer. At lest to the length of the handle of a standard barbell.
customer_reviews.author: FinLingGoy23538

customer_reviews.title: packing & handling needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Nice bar to exercise with. A bare barbell would do the same job but not at these light weights. As in other reviews mine did arrive dirty & the packing had come loose in the box. The foam was dirty & scuffed; worse part was foam had a small 1/4 inch cut. It was only one tiny cut so I wasn't worried about it. I stuck piece of black tape over it.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaE

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received
customer_reviews.text: Terrible I received a goldys gym curl bar instead of my purchased green barbell bar with silacone please help I want the correct bar I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: Workout Barbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great home workout tool. I use it after my daily swims to get in some weight training. I live in a very small space (400 Sq. Ft.) and this is enough weight to give me a work out without taking up a lot of room. The padded bar and end caps help protect my floors. I really love this bar.
customer_reviews.author: LJW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this barbell! It's of perfect weight and length and works out just right for me. Before purchasing, I was weary because a few reviews had said that the items they received were dirty and dusty, even torn up, but mine had a little bit of dust on the ends and maybe one little spot where there was a dent in the padding, not even an actual chunk missing. The right price to pay for all the uses of this barbell!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emilyf

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy. I only have the 5 lb model
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a stability pole on my Pilates Reformer machine. It's very sturdy. I only have the 5 lb model. The weight seems evenly distributed and the padding is good - no rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It did come with a few scratches in the rubber but it’s fine. I’m sure I’ll bang it up a bit over time!
customer_reviews.author: kaylak1997

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: The weighted bar works well, but the foam cover over the bar itself does not seem to be very durable. So far after just a few hours of use it shows some signs of wear and small cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Draven

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed this since the gyms closed and my trainer was sending me workout videos to do. It didn't come damage at all neither did the box it was in.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Just received my bar tonight very happy with the quality of construction
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bar tonight very happy with the quality of construction, very well-made by nicely padded and capped at both ends exactly as described. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ura Beatch

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home work out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I wish they would come out with a bar heavier than 20 pounds. but I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: great for sculpting the body
customer_reviews.text: The bar is 10 pounds, great for sculpting the body. It's a bit on the ticker side, but still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Murmaid

customer_reviews.title: but it is PERFECT. It' actually heaver that what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This workout bar is thicker than what I thought, but it is PERFECT. It' actually heaver that what I was expecting, which is still a ++ Going to order the 15lb next!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Goody

customer_reviews.title: Weight bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Jut what I wanted but with the added surprise of a pad that exists on the bar. Thought was placed into this exercise equipment and I really appreciate it! As I get stronger, I will search for a 30lb bar. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!............I LOVE THE " LARGER SIZE BAR" TO HOLD ON TO...........I HAVE READ OTHER REVIEWS WHERE PEOPLE DO "NOT" LIKE THE LARGE DIAMETER OF THIS BAR BUT I LOVE IT!.( PERSONAL PREFERENCE I GUESS).........IT HAS ENOUGH SOFT GRIP FOAM SO IT'S EASY TO HOLD ON TO........GREAT FOR LOW IMPACT EXERCISES ....PERFECT FOR WORKING THE UPPER BODY WHILE USING A FLOOR STEPPER......ENDLESS EXERCISES IF YOU USE YOUR IMAGINATION..............5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Tyyzmom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of a barbell and it works pretty well. I just don't like the hassle of changing weights plus this is much easier to store. It's probably about 4 feet long and it's around 5-6 inches thick so it's slightly hard to wrap your hands around.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality expected at all.
customer_reviews.text: Received item with rips and tears all over the padded bar and only one square end cap. Ends were also rusty. Not impressed with the quality of the item at all. Hopefully this was a one off situation but I’ll be returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brown

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome and I love it! Everyone in my house uses it and doesn't feel overwhelming but heavy enough to do what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weighed workout bar
customer_reviews.text: I love working out so these were great for those days when I feel like doing some at-home workouts instead of running to the gym. I use it to do squats, lunges, deadlifts (to practice form), cleans, etc. Good addition to incorporate into your home workouts. Nice quality. Probably will purchase a heavier one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Annieothergirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value. Quality Product! WILL buy other sizes in this same product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It's a great replacement for a general workout weight bar and it's roughly 1/2 the length. Also it's best quality is that it's padded on all things it touches. I will definitely be buying the other weights this same bar comes in.
customer_reviews.author: OklahomaNick

customer_reviews.title: Extreme dragon pole training
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses the 20 lb to work on his dragon pole technique (waaaay to heavy for me) since we live in the burbs and a 9 ft pole might raise some eyebrows. But nevertheless it is highly effective and a great way to train with little space.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn C

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT workout bar!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed one at home for non-gym days and this was PERFECT! I bought the 15 pound bar. Strong foam bar and I use it for: squats, dead rows, overhead presses, lunges, biceps, triceps, etc. EXCELLENT overall weight training bar. Next, I am planning to buy the 20 pound!
customer_reviews.author: MauiSurfGirl

customer_reviews.title: Quite useful for a quick 50 count lift
customer_reviews.text: Pretend you are back in the days of Conan; this item works well as a pretend sword, a hammer, or other crude device used in the movie. (Not responsible for role playing foo-pa's). Quite useful for a quick 50 count lift, squat, or arm curl.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is well made but too long for my needs so I don't use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: CK Gund

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery & Excellent condition! The salesperson wrapped this extra tight & ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery & Excellent condition! The salesperson wrapped this extra tight & good, so be careful when you open it with a knife or razor. I kind of pierced through mine :***( Just be careful! otherwise, they did their job and delivered this product in great protection!
customer_reviews.author: Valisha Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for arms exercise and chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought the weight a little too heavy for my work out routine so I thought but I am loving my new toned arm muscles
customer_reviews.author: Diana Perez

customer_reviews.title: Two Out Of Two Hacked Up
customer_reviews.text: Received two, but both were so hacked up that I sent them back. This company needs to hire a packing expert.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Grip
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable grip-fully padded. Packaged appropriately for shipping. Will be purchasing another weight variation.
customer_reviews.author: Mythoughts

customer_reviews.title: Bought 10 & 20 lb bars for my girl for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10 & 20 lb bars for my girl for Xmas this year. She has used the same bar before and my mom has owned the same bar for a while. Foam will tear if something sharp gets it but it does hold together very well.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this purchase. I don't have time to go to a gym so I usually workout when I have time at home. Love doing squats with these. Also, great equipment for toning the arms, shoulders, back, etc. It's a universal workout tool.
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a home gym. We use it in the house and garage.
customer_reviews.author: mrstrsims1

customer_reviews.title: Good weight with versatility if you have an imagination
customer_reviews.text: Gives an added dimension to working out at home. I've come up with ways to add weight to it up to about 60 pounds (ankle and wrist weights, dumbbells, kettlebells, etc hung on it). does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Schwinn

customer_reviews.title: Just what it was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy working out with the weighted bars. I have been looking to replace my last one which was lost in a move. This one is great and seems to be quite a bit less than the other bars. I will continue to purchase these and get the set.
customer_reviews.author: PiperPax

customer_reviews.title: I kept having to send it back because it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: I kept having to send it back because it arrived damaged. In the end I just kept it and patched the torn sponge with duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Devorah W

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Workout Bar | Weighted Workout Bar | Exercise Bar
feature_bullets: #CONSTRUCTION – Built with proprietary mixture of steel & iron & encased in a soft EVA foam exterior, for a durable, comfortable, balanced weighted bar. Colorful, hypoallergenic synthesized rubber end caps make each weight size easy to identify.
#FEATURES – Comfortable EVA foam exterior to protect others and equipment nearby. Colorful, square shaped end caps make each size easy to identify and add some color to your gym

#VERSATILE – Use this weighted body bar for strength and conditioning, circuit and interval classes, balance and alignment, sports conditioning, kick boxing and martial arts, and flexibility training.
#FUNCTIONAL – Add strength, balance and flexibility to your workout by incorporating this weighted bar into your fitness routine. Ideal for home gyms or group fitness classes.
#CHOICES – This weighted workout body bar is available in 5, 8, 10, 12, 15 and 20 pounds; Length is 51.25-inches and diameter is between 1.45” (for 5-8lb) to 1.78” (for 10+lb)
